abstract: Mark Hurd of Oracle has been traveling internationally as well as in the United States to take his message to corporations: They need to prepare for a deluge of data.
snippet: Mark Hurd of Oracle has been traveling internationally as well as in the United States to take his message to corporations: They need to prepare for a deluge of data.
lead_paragraph: You may have thought Oracle was a hard-charging sales organization even before Mark Hurd showed up. Turns out there was room for more.
